entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
